snippet: Kevin Durant scored a season-high 44 points in his return from a six-game absence as the Oklahoma City Thunder overcame Russell Westbrook’s ejection to outlast the Phoenix Suns in overtime.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Oklahoma City Thunder defeat Phoenix Suns, 137-134; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored a season-high 44 points in his return from a six-game absence as the Oklahoma City Thunder overcame Russell Westbrook’s ejection to outlast the Phoenix Suns in overtime.

headline.print_headline: Durant Has 44 Points in Overtime Win
headline.main: Kevin Durant Has 44 Points in Overtime Win
